text: 5:10 Ofa Gami 26:29; Azir Akam 4:10; Esekiel 6:8; Amos 9:9; Sekaraia 7:14Eghtɨ arazir kurar ia amizibar ivezir kuram, ia ameboghfeziaba uan boribav soghɨva dar tuzibar amɨtɨ, boriba uan ameboghfeziabav sogh men tuzibar amam. Kɨ pazɨvɨra ia damuam, eghtɨ ariaghirezir puvatɨzir darasi, kɨ me aghamsightɨ me tintinimɨn nguazir kamɨn danganir igharazibar mangegham.
